paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Four additional patients carrying only the c.1310_1313delAAGA mutation have been identified including one male breast cancer.

functional_data.summary: Identified as pathogenic in the ClinVar database.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on multiple affected individuals.
variants.additional_notes: This mutation is reported for the first time in the Tunisian population.
key_quotes: Four additional patients carrying only the c.1310_1313delAAGA mutation have been identified including one male breast cancer.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The c.7654dupA mutation was identified in 2 related patients with a strong family history of hereditary breast and ovarian cancer.

functional_data.summary: Identified as pathogenic in the ClinVar database.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on multiple affected individuals.
variants.additional_notes: This mutation is reported for the first time in the Tunisian population.
key_quotes: The c.7654dupA mutation was identified in 2 related patients with a strong family history of hereditary breast and ovarian cancer.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The c.1389_1390delAG mutation has been identified in 1 additional male breast cancer case.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on affected individual.

key_quotes: The c.1389_1390delAG mutation has been identified in 1 additional male breast cancer case.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One BRCA2 mutation (c.249delG) was identified in one ovarian cancer patient.
